Advisory.Description:
## Withdrawn Advisory
This advisory has been withdrawn because the vulnerability affects a binary, not a library in a [supported ecosystem](https://github.com/github/advisory-database#supported-ecosystems). Therefore, users of the library should not receive alerts. This link is maintained to preserve external references.

## Original Description

### Impact
Agents running on macOS could be susceptible to unexpected code execution through user supplied environment variables.

### Patches
Fixed in versions 14.2.4, 13.4.13 and 12.4.31.

### References
* Fix PR: https://github.com/gravitational/teleport/pull/36132
Advisory.Summary: User-provided environment values allow execution on macOS agents
